name: Avoid having Methods and Functions without naming convention (PHP)
description:
This rule searches for all Functions and Methods that do not respect naming convention.
Following naming conventions are considered for evaluation of this QR:
If method name is not in camel case, violation will be reported.
If global function is neither in camel nor in snake case, violation will be reported.
output:
This report lists all Functions and Methods that do not respect naming convention.

This QR provides the following information:
Function or Method full name.
rationale: Use of naming convention makes the source code easier to read and therefore to maintain.
remediation: Modify the source code to reduce the number of Functions and Methods that do not respect naming convention.
remediationSample:
<?php
  class foo {
   public function aMethod() { // violation removed
   }
}
function aFunction() {  // violation removed
}
function another_function() {  // violation removed
}
?>
sample:
<?php
  class foo {
   public function AMethod() { // violation
    
   }
}
function AFunction() {  // violation
}
function AnotherFunction() {  // violation
}
?>
